info.name: Fanite - Darken Fanfiction
info.description:
Far this day for I no longer making a style for stylish of any kind. I leaving the code up for whoever want to continue the project but never expect a update of any kind from me. The code is free to anyone to use to or to modfied in any way. Please don't leave a topic for updates or bugs, I will not fix them.

Enjoy,
Wantless
info.additionalInfo:
Firefox 3.6 and higher are supported.
Chrome and Safari support are being added later.
